title: Job Seeking Platform - HirelyNow
description: Developed a full-stack job portal where users can register as job Seekers or verified Employers.
Implemented authentication (JWT, bcrypt) with role-based access control.
Employers can post, update, delete jobs; Job Seekers view and apply.
Used MongoDB Atlas for cloud storage, deployed on Render.
Handled secure cookie-based authentication with proper CORS and credentials setup.

title: Expense Tracker
description: Built a full-stack app to track income, expenses, and total balance in real-time.
Users can add multiple incomes and expenses with categorized details.
Displays financial overview with pie chart visualization using Chart.js.
Integrated Excel export feature to download transactions as .xlsx file.
Shows recent transactions and summary of income vs expenditure.
